query.description: conditional if accept open amount or order payment, such as virtual terminal is optional otherwise is mandatory. 32 chars hexadecimal string
optional, predefined string. Refer to the channel column in the Channel Lists.
optional, predefined string. Currently only en for English & cn for Simplified Chinese.
optional, alphanumeric with pipe ( | ) as data  delimiter and comma ( , ) as recipient separato

formdata.description: The payment amount
Unique transaction ID for tracking purpose
Merchant ID in PG system
skey = md5( txID & domain & verify_key & amount )
The URL to receive POST response from PG

0 = plain text result (default)
1 = result via POST method
Merchant ID in PG system
skey   =md5( rdate & merchantID & secret_key )

The date or beginning time of transactions to query
2020-10-10 or 2020-10-10 07:11:24
Without rduration, the search duration is 24 hours or 86400 seconds starting from rdate

00 - success
11 - failed
22 - pending

Combine with delimiter “|” for multiple status or left empty for all status
2 or 3

TransactionRate - transaction rate
BillingInfo - billing info
TransactionCost - transaction cost
Channel - channel
BillingMobileNumber - billing mobile
TransactionFee - transaction fee
GST - GST (tax)
NetAmount - net amount
IPAddress - IP address
BankName - bank name
BIN - card no (hidden)
ExpiryDate - card expiry date
StatusDescription - status description
SettlementDate - settlement date
PaidDate - paid date
TerminalID - terminal ID
PayTransactionID - transaction ID
BuyerName - buyer name
CaptureRefID - Capture Reference ID (Only in v3)
RefundRefID - Refund Reference ID (Only in v3)
all - for all additional fields

Combine with delimiter “,” for multiple fields
Response format in either text/json/csv(only in v2 and v3)

query.description: Indicate version of the API. Current version is 5.0. If not specified, version 1.0 will be used.
The date of settlement to query
Recommend to use csv for large file
Download option is only available for CSV format
Determines the page to view for D records that have a limit of 5000 transactions. Currently available to version 5.0

formdata.description: Merchant ID in PG system
Unique PG transaction ID
The total amount paid or to be paid
Reference ID for tracking purpose sent by merchant
skey   =md5( txnID & amount & domain & verify_key )

item.name: Capture Request (For pre-auth or authorized transaction)

formdata.description: Unique transaction ID for tracking purpose
Merchant ID in PG system
skey   =md5( txnID & domain & secret_key)
The URL to receive POST response from PG

0 = plain text result (default)
1 = result via POST method
P - Partial Refund
Merchant ID provided by PG
Unique reference ID for tracking purpose sent by merchant
PG Transaction ID
eg. ‘5.00’ Amount to be refunded
Applicable for Online Banking and Physical Payment transactions only. (Refer to predefined bank lists
Applicable for Online Banking and Physical Payment transactions only. Two letters country ISO code. (Default value: MY)
Applicable for Online Banking and Physical Payment transactions only.
Applicable for Online Banking and Physical Payment transactions only.
Signature = md5(  RefundType .  MerchantID .  RefID .  TxnID .  Amount . secret_key )

This is to include or exclude MDR refund to the buyer if the amount is same as bill amount.
Available value is as below:
0 - Include MDR/Full Refund (Default)
1 - Exclude/Reserved MDR
This is the URL for merchant to receive refund status (same response as this API), either 00 (Success) or 11 (Rejected)  with slightly different Signature

item.name: Partial Refund Status Inquiry by TxnID/RefID

formdata.description: PG Transaction ID
Merchant ID provided by PG
Signature = md5(  TxnID .  MerchantID .  verify_key )

item.name: Partial Refund Status Inquiry by TxnID/RefID

formdata.description: Merchant ID provided by PG

Channel requested:
AlipaySQR - Alipay Static QR
WeChatPaySQR - WeChat Pay Static QR
Items ID. E.g: S001
ISO-4217 currency code
The total amount to be paid in one purchase order. 2 decimal points and comma( , ) is not allowed
Items name
Item description
Checksum = md5(  merchantID . channel . orderid . currency . amount  .  verify_key )

query.description:
Global: system-wide OK rate
Merchant: merchant only OK rate
skey  = md5( domain & secret_key & reqTime & reqType )
Latest sampling window size in HOUR for merchant-only request. If the total sampling number is less than 30, it has less reference value due to the low statistical significance and n/a will be given
First 6-digit number of the PAN, e.g. 519603

Predefined value as below:
BNM
Maybank

formdata.description: PG Transaction ID
The total amount to be paid in one purchase order. 2 decimal points, comma( , ) is not allowed.
Merchant ID provided by PG
Checksum= md5(  tranID . amount . merchantID .  verify_key )
Merchant ID provided by PG

Predefined value as below:
Y
N

Predefined value as below:
month
week
day
year
quarter
halfyear
bimonth
biweek
Billing cycle (E.g. ‘6’, ‘12’, ‘24’)

Predefined value as below:
On
Off
NA
skey  = md5( domain & secret_key & charge_on_endofmonth & period & cycle_term & status)
